Reviews.Title: Remembering the trip to Disney forever!
Reviews.Author: J. King ""Lover of Jesus""
Reviews.Content: Love the efficiency of this camera.  This was a great package of items.  Helped us capture all the best moments of our vacation!

ProductInfo.Features:
Powershot ELPH 115 IS Silver 16MP Digital Camera with 8x Opt. Zoom and Smart AUTO
16GB Secure Digital SD Memory Card
Ultra-Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case - DP15
NB-11L Replacement Battery For PowerShot A2300,A2400,A3400,A4000,110HSE,320HSE
Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod, 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Canon Powershot ELPH 115 IS Silver Digital Camera 16GB Bundle - Includes camera, 16GB SD Memory Card, Ultra-Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case, NB-11L Replacement Battery, Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod, and 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit
